required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of a Microalgae Extract PhaeoSOL Combined With Guarana on Cognitive Function and Gaming Performance of Video Gamers
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of a Microalgae Extract PhaeoSOL Combined With Guarana on Cognitive Function and Gaming Performance of Video Gamers

brief_summary.textblock:
Considering the important growing development of gaming in the world, this research area has developed considerably over the last few years. Even if it seems to be well admitted that video gamers showed better cognitive functions (e.g. visual selective attention, cognitive flexibility, task switching) parameters compared to non video gamers there is a constant concern for optimizing performance as for all other kind of athletes. However to our knowledge, only one randomized controlled trial have investigated the potential benefits of dietary supplementation on cognitive function and performance in video gamers. The use of microalgea as molecule of interest sources is a recent promising approach also to meet societal challenge as the maintain of biodiversity/landscape.
Thus, the purpose of this study is to examine whether acute (single-dose) and chronic (1 month) supplementation of Microphyt's phaeosol ingredients (BrainPhyt) ingested with or without guarana extract (natural source of caffeine), would affect cognitive function and gaming performance in experienced video gamers.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Change in reaction time - Light tracking test
Change in general attention score - Go no go task test
Change in sustained attention score - Psychomotor vigilance task test
Change in attention shifting score - Berg-Washington card sorting task test

secondary_outcome.description: Change in gaming performance score from 0 to 100 - Higher scores mean a better outcome
Change in Mood state questionnaire score from 0 to 100 - Higher scores mean a better outcome - Profil of Mood state questionnaire
Change in sleep quality questionnaire score from 0 to 100 - Higher scores mean a better outcome
Change in eyes irritability score -Visual analogic scale from 0 to 100 - Higher scores mean a worse outcome
Change in global fatigue score - Visual analogic scale from 0 to 100 - higher scores mean a worse outcome

arm_group.description: 1 Phaeosol softgel of 500mg/day (containing 218mg/d of active ingredients) and 1 placebo softgel of 500mg/day (218mg of sunflower oil -look like softgel of Phaeosol product) + 1 Guarana capsule of 500mg/day (Organic guarana extract containing 8-11% of native cafeine)
2 Phaeosol softgels of 500mg/day (each containing 218mg of active ingredients) + 1 Guarana capsule of 500mg/day (Organic guarana extract containing 8-11% of native cafeine)
2 placebo softgels of 500mg/day (each 218mg of sunflower oil -look like softgel of Phaeosol product) + 1 capsule of 500mg/day containing Microcellulose (look like capsule of guarana)

intervention.description: 1 Phaeosol softgel of 500mg/day (containing 218mg/d of active ingredients) and 1 placebo softgel of 500mg/day (218mg of sunflower oil -look like softgel of Phaeosol product) + 1 Guarana capsule of 500mg/day (Organic guarana extract containing 8-11% of native cafeine). Subjects were instructed to take the study supplement or placebo once daily for 1 months (±2 days). The first and the last doses will be administered at the clinical site during Visit 2 (Experiment 1) and Visit 3 (Experiment 2, respectively).

2 Phaeosol softgels of 500mg/day (each containing 218mg of active ingredients) + 1 Guarana capsule of 500mg/day (Organic guarana extract containing 8-11% of native cafeine). Subjects were instructed to take the study supplement or placebo once daily for 1 months (±2 days). The first and the last doses will be administered at the clinical site during Visit 2 (Experiment 1) and Visit 3 (Experiment 2, respectively).

2 placebo softgels of 500mg/day (each 218mg of sunflower oil -look like softgel of Phaeosol product) + 1 capsule of 500mg/day containing Microcellulose (look like capsule of guarana). Subjects were instructed to take the study supplement or placebo once daily for 1 months (±2 days). The first and the last doses will be administered at the clinical site during Visit 2 (Experiment 1) and Visit 3 (Experiment 2, respectively).
